description: When the trap indicating that a session is down is sent, the cause for the down LDP session is displayed.

event.Summary: MPLS LDP session down due to $v1

description: This object indicates the cause that the session becomes Down.
Options:
1. sessionUp(0) -indicates that the session was Up.
2. helloHoldTimerExp(1) -indicates that the Hello hold timer expired.
3. ssnHoldTimerExp(2) -indicates that the session hold timer expired.
4. resetMplsLdp(3) -indicates MPLS LDP was reset.
5. undoMplsLdp(4) -indicates that MPLS LDP was disabled.
6. undoMpls(5) -indicates that MPLS was disabled.
7. undoMplsLdpRemotePeer(6) -indicates that the remote peer was deleted.
8. modifyGRConfig(7) -indicates that GR capability was modified.
9. modifyGRTimer(8) -indicates that the GR timer was modified.
10. modifyKeepaliveTimer(9) -indicates that the keepalive timer was modified.
11. modifyMD5Config(10) -indicates that MD5 was configured.
12. ssnRoleSwitch(11) -indicates that the session role was switched.
13. modifyMTUConfig(12) -indicates that the MTU was modified.
14. modifyTransportAddress(13) -indicates that the transport address was modified.
15. modifyLDPLsrID(14) -indicates that the LDP LSR ID was modified.
16. recvNotification(15) -indicates that the notification message was received.
17. transportAddressNotMatch(16) -indicates that the transport address was not matched.
18. protocolGR(17) -indicates that the protocol GR was in processing.
19. ifStatusChanged(18) -indicates that the interface status was changed.
20. tcpDown(19) -indicates that TCP was Down.
21. otherReason(20) -indicates that another cause was involved.
22. sentNotification(21) -indicates that the notification was sent.
23. canntBuildSessionRelation(22) -indicates that the session relation cannot be built.
24. receiveErrorMessageFromPeer(23) -indicates that error message from peer was received.
25. receiveSocketError(24) -indicates that error pakcet from socket was received.
26. sessionDelete(25) -indicates that the session was deleted.
27. modifyCapabilityAnnouncementConfig(26) -indicates that the capability-announcement was modified.
28. modifyLocalLsrID(27) -indicates that the Local LSR ID was modified.
29. modifyP2MP(28) -indicates that the mLDP P2MP was modified.
30. modifyMP2MP(29) -indicates that the mLDP MP2MP was modified.
31. sessionProtectTimerExp(30) -indicates that the session protection timer expired.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpSessionDownReason

description: This object indicates the index of the interface on which the session is established.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpSessionIfIndex

description: When the trap indicating that a session is down is sent, the cause for the down LSP session is displayed.

event.Summary: MPLS LDP LSP down due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspDown HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspFec s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspInLabel c 9999 HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspOutLabel c 9999 HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspOutIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspDownReason i 1

description: This object indicates the destination address of an LSP.
The value is either a destination IP address or a prefix of an IP address.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspFec

description: This object indicates that labels are pushed into all the packets for direct MPLS forwarding.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspInLabel

description: This object indicates that all the packets swap labels for MPLS forwarding.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspOutLabel

description: The value of this object identifies the index of the outgoing interface of the LSP.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspOutIfIndex

description: This object indicates the cause that the LSP becomes Down.
Options:
1. routeDelete(1) -indicates that a route has been deleted.
2. lspmNotify(2) -indicates that LSPM notify.
3. canNotRecoveryFromGr(3) -indicates that the recovery from GR was failed.
4. recvReleaseMsg(4) -indicates that the release message was received.
5. recvWithdrawMsg(5) -indicates that the withdraw message was received.
6. upStreamLost(6) -indicates that the upstream route was lost.
7. downStreamLost(7) -indicates that the downstream route was lost.
8. otherReason(8) -indicates that another cause was involved.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspDownReason

description: A trap is sent to clear the down trap of a specified FEC's ingress lsp.

event.Summary: MPLS LDP host ingress LSP down alarm cleared

description: This object indicates the destination address of an LSP.
The value is either a destination IP address or a prefix of an IP address.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspFec

description: A trap is sent when all the ingress lsp of a specified FEC went down.

event.Summary: MPLS LDP host ingress LSP down due to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpHostIngressLspDown HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspFec s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownReason i 1 HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownMplsLsrId s EXAM HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownOutIfIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownOutIfMainIp a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownOutIfState i 1 HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownDownstreamPeerLsrId s EXAMPL

description: This object indicates the destination address of an LSP.
The value is either a destination IP address or a prefix of an IP address.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwMplsLdpLspFec

description: The LDP LSP down reason.
Options:
1. other(1) -indicates other reasons.
2. session down(2) -indicates the ldp session went down.
3. route change(3) -indicates the route changed.
4. cannot recovery from GR(4) -indicates LSP cannot recovery from graceful-restart.
5. policy change(5) -indicates the policy changed.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownReason

description: This object indicates the LSR ID of failed router.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownMplsLsrId

description: This object indicates the outgoing interface index of the failed router.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownOutIfIndex

description: This object indicates the main ip address of the failed router's outgoing interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownOutIfMainIp

description: The state of the failed router's outgoing interface.
Options:
1. up(1) -indicates that the state of the outgoing interface is Up.
2. down(2) -indicates that the state of the outgoing interface is Down.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownOutIfState

description: This object indicates the failed router's downstream peer's LSR ID.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MPLSLDP-MIB::hwLdpLspDownDownstreamPeerLsrId
